Title: A Sound of Thunder
Writer: Ray Bradbury (short story), Thomas Dean Donnelly (screen story), Joshua Oppenheimer (screen story), Thomas Dean Donnelly (screenplay), Joshua Oppenheimer (screenplay), Gregory Poirier (screenplay)
Actors: Armin Rohde, Heike Makatsch, Jemima Rooper, David Oyelowo
Plot: A single mistake in the past, by a time travel company in the future, has devastating and unforeseen consequences.
Production: Dante Entertainment, Warner Brothers, Crusader Entertainment LLC, Franchise Pictures, Forge
